articles.title: Market Basket board votes to remove Arthur T. Demoulas
articles.description:
Tuesday’s vote followed months of escalating corporate tensions and two failed mediation sessions.

The post Market Basket board votes to remove Arthur T. Demoulas appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Market Basket board voted to remove Arthur T. Demoulas on September 10, 2025.
Vote followed months of corporate tensions and two failed mediation sessions.
Removal may affect employee morale and customer loyalty in Boston stores.

articles.title: Connelly Early strikes out 11, tying Red Sox record for debut, as Boston tops A’s 6-0
articles.description:
A 23-year-old left-hander selected in the fifth round of the 2023 amateur draft, Early earned his first MLB win.

The post Connelly Early strikes out 11, tying Red Sox record for debut, as Boston tops A’s 6-0 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Connelly Early struck out 11 batters in his MLB debut for the Red Sox.
The 23-year-old left-hander earned his first win on September 10, 2025.
Early's performance ties a Red Sox record, boosting local team morale.
